mapper.insert: insert into log ( user_name, role_name, ip, busi, oper_type, method, start_time, end_time, status_cd) values ( #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{busi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{operType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{statusCd,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update log set user_name = #{userName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, role_name = #{roleName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ip = #{ip,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, busi = #{busi,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, oper_type = #{operType,jdbcType=INTEGER}, method = #{method,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, status_cd = #{statusCd,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, user_name, role_name, ip, busi, oper_type, method, start_time, end_time, status_cd from log where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id, user_name, role_name, ip, busi, oper_type, method, start_time, end_time, status_cd from log
